alert.note: Alert for Cerro Gordo; Hancock; Humboldt; Wright (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 7:55AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Wright, Hancock, northeastern Humboldt and western Cerro Gordo Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 755 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Eagle Grove, or 7 miles west of Clarion, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Clarion around 800 AM CDT. Elm Lake around 805 AM CDT. Belmond around 815 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Garner, Clear Lake and Mason City Municipal Airport. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 181 and 202. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
